DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics warfarin coadministered albiglutide healthy adult subject . The primary objective ass effect albiglutide dose pharmacokinetics warfarin .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study With Albiglutide Warfarin
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics warfarin coadministered albiglutide healthy adult subject . The primary objective ass effect albiglutide dose pharmacokinetics warfarin .
